description: Defines a custom exception class 'ServiceException' for handling service-level errors within the 'com.icontrol.api.client' package.

classes.name: ServiceException
classes.description: A custom exception class extending Java's 'Exception' to represent service-related errors.

methods.name: ServiceException()
methods.description: Default constructor for creating a ServiceException without details.

methods.name: ServiceException(String detailMessage, Throwable throwable)
methods.description: Constructor allowing detailed message and cause.
